Uses of Package
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm

Packages that use com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm
com.ibm.zrl.credsystem Package contains fundamential functionality to use the Idemix anonymous credential system. 
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm This package contains the data model abstractions appearing in the various protocol roles such as credentials, attributes, or commitments. 
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm.structure This package contains the structural information about some of the data model abstractions. 
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.issuance This package contains classes for issuing new credentials. 
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.issuance.update This package contains classes implementing the update functionality, which is an extension to the issuing protocol that can be run non-interactively. 
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof This package contains the code to implement the Idemix proving protocol. 
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils This package contains various utilities, such as the parser and the serializer, used throughout the Idemix library. 
 

Classes in com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm used by com.ibm.zrl.credsystem
Credential
          Credential abstraction.
MasterSecret
          The user's master secret.
 

Classes in com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm used by com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm
Attribute
          Attributes consists of a link to an attribute structure, a value, and possibly a list of prime factors.
Commitment
          Class to express a Commitment to one or more messages.
CommitmentOpening
          This class is a sub-class of Commitment.
Credential.UpdateInformation
          Update information needed to update the signature.
DomNym
          Domain nym abstraction.
MasterSecret
          The user's master secret.
Nym
          Pseudonym abstraction.
Representation
          Class to express a Representation of the form R := g_1^x_1 * ...
RepresentationOpening
          This class is a sub-class of Represenation.
Value
          Object that contains the value of an attribute during the issuance process.
Values
          Object that contains a list of values.
